remarks:
Conjunction distributes over exclusive-or.  In intuitionistic logic this assertion is also true, even though ~ xordi does not necessarily hold, in part because the usual definition of xor is subtly different in intuitionistic logic.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 7-Oct-2018.) 

---

 Conjunction distributes over exclusive-or.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro and Jim Kingdon, 7-Oct-2018.)
statement: anxordi $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( ps \/_ ch ) ) <-> ( ( ph /\ ps ) \/_ ( ph /\ ch ) ) ) $.
